name: Hunt nearby entities
goal: Track and eliminate target animals or hostile mobs with available gear
environment: Use perception to list target entities, distances, and obstacles
Consider terrain for line-of-sight and cover

steps.title: Choose a target
steps.details: Identify the closest suitable entity (animal for food or hostile mob). Note its position, nearby allies, and any hazards like cliffs or lava.

steps.title: Equip and approach
steps.details: Equip the best available weapon/shield. Approach using cover, avoiding fall damage. Use blocks to pillar or kite if the mob is dangerous.
checks: Hunger sufficient for sprinting if needed

steps.title: Engage and loot
steps.details: Attack while circle-strafing or keeping distance for ranged weapons. After the kill, pick up drops quickly and retreat to a safe spot to heal.

notes: If multiple mobs aggro, block with walls or retreat to high ground before re-engaging.
